content.description: Sweet short line on the main boulder right side of the V7 flat top Project. Start matched on the glassy rail down low. Find good feet and move out left hand, then cross right on some sweet holds. Manage the lip and stick a thin heel on a very water polished ledge. Battle the slopey lip till you flip the right hand into a press, and trust your shoes to the top. Climb it dead summer to bump the grade to V9 :p
content.location:
From OPB: "From the Finger Canyon Trail Parking lot hike north up the road to the trailhead. Follow the Pontatoc Trail east through one wash and follow it as it turns north just shy of a second wash. Turn right and head into the wash when you can clearly see the boulders are just downhill from the trail."

 Once you find the cluster its the first bigger boulder dead on the wash to your right side.

content.description: Starts low below Blank Stare (V2 on OPB). Right hand on a good low crimp, left hand on an even lower, not so good side pull/crimp. Lock off the right hand and hope it sticks as you go to a thin left hand side crimp. Suck it in then hope that sticks too, then throw a hail marry to the jug of Blank Stare and top out.
content.location: Same boulder as muffin top. On the main face.

content.description: Variety of short boulders. Grades vary from easy and not worth it to hard and maybe worth it. Lot's of problems here from OPB. Will transfer them over as I go along.Â
